name: Azure Arc-enabled Servers - Update Manager
description: Machines not configured for Azure Update Manager. Enable centralized update management for all Arc-enabled servers.
details: Azure Update Manager provides centralized patch management for Arc-enabled servers across on-premises, multi-cloud, and edge locations. Ensure compliance and security with automated update scheduling.
activationSteps: In Azure Portal, go to Azure Update Manager → Add machines → Select Arc-enabled servers to enable update management.

name: Azure Arc-enabled Servers - Inventory & Tracking
description: Machines not configured for Inventory and Change Tracking. Get visibility into software inventory and configuration changes.
details: Enable Change Tracking and Inventory to monitor software changes, file integrity, and Windows service changes on Arc-enabled servers. Essential for compliance and security.
activationSteps: Enable Change Tracking extension on Arc-enabled servers via Azure Portal → Automation → Change Tracking.

name: Azure Arc-enabled Servers - Guest Configuration
description: Machines not configured for Azure Policy Guest Configuration. Audit and enforce compliance policies on Arc servers.
details: Guest Configuration allows you to audit and enforce configuration standards across Arc-enabled servers. Monitor OS settings, installed applications, and security baselines.
activationSteps: Assign Azure Policy definitions with Guest Configuration to Arc-enabled servers in Azure Policy service.

name: Azure Arc Best Practice Assessment
description: Run best practice assessments to optimize Arc-enabled server configurations and identify security gaps.
details: Best Practice Assessments analyze Arc-enabled servers for security vulnerabilities, performance optimization, and compliance with Microsoft recommendations.
activationSteps: Enable Azure Advisor recommendations for Arc-enabled servers and review assessment reports in Azure Portal.

name: Azure Hybrid Benefit for Arc Servers
description: Use existing Windows Server licenses with Software Assurance on Arc-enabled servers to reduce costs.
details: Apply Azure Hybrid Benefit to Arc-enabled Windows Servers running in non-Azure environments to maximize license value and reduce operational costs.
activationSteps: Configure Hybrid Benefit settings in Azure Portal for each Arc-enabled Windows Server.

name: Arc-enabled Servers - Monitoring & Insights
description: Enable Azure Monitor and VM Insights for Arc-enabled servers to track performance and health.
details: Monitor performance metrics, logs, and dependencies for Arc-enabled servers using Azure Monitor. Get insights into CPU, memory, disk, and network utilization.
activationSteps: Install Azure Monitor Agent on Arc-enabled servers and configure data collection rules in Azure Monitor.

name: Arc-enabled Servers - Microsoft Defender for Cloud
description: Protect Arc-enabled servers with Microsoft Defender for Cloud. Detect threats and vulnerabilities across hybrid infrastructure.
details: Microsoft Defender for Cloud provides advanced threat protection, vulnerability assessment, and security recommendations for Arc-enabled servers.
activationSteps: Enable Defender for Servers plan in Microsoft Defender for Cloud and onboard Arc-enabled machines.

name: Arc-enabled Servers - Automated Machine Configuration
description: Use Azure Automation to deploy and manage configurations across Arc-enabled servers at scale.
details: Automate configuration management, script execution, and desired state configuration (DSC) for Arc-enabled servers using Azure Automation.
activationSteps: Create Automation Account and link Arc-enabled servers for configuration management.

name: Windows 365 Cloud PC Access
description: Deploy Windows desktops and apps on Azure with Windows 365. Included at no additional cost with active Software Assurance.
details: Windows 365 provides a complete, personalized Windows experience from the cloud to any device. SA customers get access to Windows 365 Enterprise at no additional cost.
activationSteps: Visit the Microsoft 365 admin center and enable Windows 365 for your organization.

name: Extended Security Updates (ESU)
description: Get free Extended Security Updates for Windows Server and SQL Server after end of support.
details: Continue receiving critical security updates for legacy systems beyond their support lifecycle at no cost with active SA.
activationSteps: ESUs are automatically available through Windows Update for SA customers.

name: Home Use Program
description: Employees can purchase Microsoft 365 apps for personal use at a significant discount.
details: The Home Use Program allows your employees to get Microsoft 365 for home use at deeply discounted rates, improving productivity and satisfaction.
activationSteps: Register your organization at the Home Use Program portal and distribute access codes to employees.

name: Planning Services
description: Get expert guidance for deployment planning, including 5-day planning sessions with Microsoft partners.
details: SA includes days of planning services per year to help plan deployments, migrations, and optimize your environment.
activationSteps: Contact your Microsoft account team or visit the Volume Licensing Service Center.

name: Training Vouchers
description: Access to e-learning courses and instructor-led training for IT professionals.
details: Training vouchers provide access to Microsoft Official Curriculum courses and e-learning platforms.
activationSteps: Redeem training vouchers through the Volume Licensing Service Center.

name: 24/7 Technical Support
description: Priority support for break-fix issues with faster response times.
details: Get priority technical support with guaranteed response times for critical issues.
activationSteps: Access support through your Premier or Unified support portal.

name: SQL Server Developer Edition
description: Free SQL Server Developer Edition for non-production use.
details: Full-featured SQL Server for development and testing environments at no cost.
activationSteps: Download from the Microsoft Evaluation Center or Visual Studio Subscriptions.

name: Windows Autopatch
description: Automated Windows and Microsoft 365 update management service for cloud-managed devices.
details: Microsoft-managed update service that keeps your Windows and Office apps current automatically with zero-touch deployment for Intune-managed devices.
activationSteps: Enable Windows Autopatch in the Microsoft Intune admin center.

name: Version Upgrade Rights
description: Automatically receive rights to new versions of software as they're released.
details: Stay current with the latest features and security updates at no additional cost.
activationSteps: Download new versions from the Volume Licensing Service Center as released.
